buzzword.translation[0].definitions[0].d: a word or phrase from one special area of knowledge that people suddenly think is very important
buzzword.translation[0].definitions[0].e: ‘Multimedia’ has been a buzzword in the computer industry for years.
buzzword.translation[1].definitions[0].d: a word or phrase from one special area of knowledge, that people suddenly think is important and use a lot
buzzword.translation[1].definitions[0].e: The term ‘online business community’ is something of a marketing buzzword these days.
